objects.text:
• Complete Apple Integration Across Devices
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display
• Latest iPad & iPhone Package
• Premium Aluminum Construction

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem for seamless integration and productivity
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Latest generation iPad with stunning edge-to-edge display
• iPhone featuring Touch ID and premium build quality
• All devices in pristine condition with original Silver/White finish
• macOS and iOS platforms for ultimate compatibility
• Powerful performance for work, creativity, and entertainment
• Sync across devices with iCloud integration
• Premium aluminum construction across all devices
• Perfect for professionals, students, and tech enthusiasts
• Includes high-resolution displays on all devices
• Built-in security features and regular software updates
• Trackpad with Multi-Touch gesture support on MacBook
• Portable and lightweight design for on-the-go use
• Access to App Store's vast application ecosystem

banner_details:
This banner presents a sleek and tech-savvy layout showcasing a "Premium Device Bundle" within the Apple ecosystem. The background features soft gradients and faint graphic circles that create depth and a modern feel. At the top, a futuristic sans-serif heading labeled `heading` captures attention, followed by a bold blue subheading (`subheading`) that creates visual hierarchy. A content block (`description`) lists product features using bullet points. To the right, the `product_image` displays a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone, emphasizing the product lineup. At the bottom, the `price` is displayed prominently, accompanied by a rectangular blue `cta_button` with white uppercase text (`cta`) for a call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**  
- Azure Blue: #007AFF  
- Charcoal: #333333  
- Soft Gray: #F5F7FA  
- Mid Gray: #A0A0A0  
- Light Gray Circles (opacity layers): #007AFF at 3% and 2%  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases Apple devices using a clean and modern aesthetic. Dominant colors include the sleek silver-gray of the device bodies (#C0C0C0), black keyboard and screen borders (#000000), contrasted by the vivid display visuals. The MacBook screen blends soft sunset pinks (#F7B7A3) and purples (#CDA0D9) with earthy browns (#8B6D5C) from the rocky lakescape, creating warmth and serenity. The iPad and iPhone use cooler tones, highlighting shades of blue (#5295D0) and white (#FFFFFF), which give a futuristic digital feel. Together, the palette balances warmth and cool neutrality—perfect for a tech advertisement banner that feels professional, minimal, and inviting.
